outputSpeech.text: Welcome to the Alexa How Can I Help? skill. Let's do something good together. You can ask me for event categories, or ask me for events by category or events by date.

card.title: How Can I Help?
card.content: Welcome to the Alexa How Can I Help? skill. Let's do something good together. You can ask me for event categories, or ask me for events by category or events by date.

outputSpeech.text: Please ask me for an event category, for example, you can say, What are the categories?
